a.aria-label: Read more about School at Home Distance Learning

div.p:
As everyone navigates these different and challenging days, it is important to remember the mental and physical well-being of our students is more important than ever. Keeping kids connected to their teachers and coaches is critical right now. The link below contains some resources that may be beneficial for school leaders to review and share with your coaches and teachers as we all look for new ways to support our students through this unique time in their lives.
Student health and wellness resources . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Student Health and Wellness

div.p: Click this link for the COVID-19 Update Letter

a.aria-label: Read more about COVID-19 Update Letter

div.p: Due to the closing of Kansas Schools because of the COVID -19 virus, USD #334 will continue serving Grab 'n Go curb side lunches and breakfasts until June 30, 2020. A lunch and breakfast will be provided to all 1 - 18 year old children at no cost. You must call 785-427-3334 between 8:00 - 8:30 a.m. to reserve your children's meals. Meals may be picked up at either Miltonvale Grade School or Glasco Grade School between ll:30 am and 12:30 pm. If you have any questions, please call the district office at 785-427-3334.

a.aria-label: Read more about Grab 'n Go Breakfast and Lunch

div.p:
Southern Cloud Schools will be closed from Monday March16 until the end of the 2020 school year due to the COVID-19. All activities have been postponed.
Governor Kelly Recommends the Kansas State Department of Education Temporarily Close Schools to implement comprehensive education plan amidst COVID-19 Pandemic.

a.aria-label: Read more about Southern Cloud Schools Closed

h3.a: NPL Spring 2020 Art Show Winner Results

div.p:
Although the NPL show had to be taken down quickly, they were able to have just enough time to get things judged before the artwork had to be removed!
Please join me in congratulating the following Glasco students:
Acrylic Painting Honorable mention= Joshua Mitchell-Fulton, Glasco “Stormy Seas”
3-D Design/Sculpture Second= Peyton Walters, Glasco, “Daisy of Diamonds”
Ceramics Second= Peyton Walters, Glasco, “Octopus”
Graphic Design/Digital Photography Honorable mention= Bryson Schmidt, Glasco “One Last Ride”
Chalk . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about NPL Spring 2020 Art Show Winner Results

h3.a: 2020 NPL Spring Art Show Winner Results

div.p:
The month of February, every High School Art student in southern Cloud 334 miltonvale school had to create a project to enter the 7th annual Northern Plains League Art show.
Those who entered were, Ronni Newman. Evan Custer, Emily Custer, Chelsea Stout, Matthew Paillet, Olivia Ralph, Rael Beals, Xavier Hunter, Tea Kennedy, and Chloe Waite.
Two of my students placed in Oil Pastels, Chloe is a senior and did a beautiful job. Xavier is a sophomore.
Both are very talented. I feel all my students rose to the occasion. Art has been such a pleasure to create with all my students.
Congratulations to the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about 2020 NPL Spring Art Show Winner Results

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 21:55 pm CDT

td.span: A slight chance of showers between 2am and 3am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms after 3am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 43. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8am, then a slight chance of showers between 8am and 10am. Mostly cloudy through mid morning, then gradual clearing, with a high near 69. South wind 5 to 15 mph becoming northwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
Mostly clear, with a low around 41. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
